item.description: library(tidyverse) library(scales) library(ggrepel) library(waffle) Best <- read_csv("goats.csv") goal <- Best %>% group_by(Age, Player) %>% summarise(total = sum(Gls)) %>% arrange(Player) %>% group_by(Player) %>% mutate( cumulativetotal= cumsum(total) ) ## `summarise()` has grouped output by 'Age'. You can override using the `.groups` argument. ggplot() + geom_step(data = goal, aes(x= Age, y=cumulativetotal, group = Player, color = Player)) + labs(x="Age", y="Cumulative Goals", title="", subtitle="", caption="Source: Sports-Reference.com | By Samvruth Raj") + scale_color_manual(values = c("black", "#EDBB00")) + theme_minimal() + theme( plot.
